# MarketplaceV3Offers.getOffer() method

Get a single offer

## Example

```javascript
const offerId = 0;
const offer = await contract.offers.getOffer(offerId);
```

**Signature:**

```typescript
getOffer(offerId: BigNumberish): Promise<OfferV3>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type         | Description    |
| --------- | ------------ | -------------- |
| offerId   | BigNumberish | the listing id |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;[OfferV3](./sdk.offerv3.md)&gt;

the Direct listing object
